actions.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. LaFalce.
The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) pursuant to the rule.
On agreeing to the LaFalce amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 126 - 299 (Roll no. 164).

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to retain the the same pay-parity provisions for the Securities and Exchange Commission contained in the underlying bill; and would have provided approximately $5 billion in fee reduction over a 10 year period.
purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute to add a complete new text which does not contain the sunset provisions present in the underlying bill.
